data.eml:eml: A new species of Eigenmannia Jordan and Evermann (Gymnotiformes: Sternopygidae) from the upper rio Paraguai basin

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Campos-Da-Paz, Ricardo, Queiroz, Igor Raposo (2017): A new species of Eigenmannia Jordan and Evermann (Gymnotiformes: Sternopygidae) from the upper rio Paraguai basin. Zootaxa 4216 (1): 73-84, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.229831
